item.title: Zenith
item.description: Overview In the Internet of Things(IoT) era, the demands for low-latency computing for time-sensitive applications (e.g., location-based augmented reality games, real-time smart grid management, real-time navigation using wearables) has been growing rapidly. Edge Computing provides an additional layer of infrastructure to fill latency gaps between IoT devices and the backend computing infrastructure. Zenith decouples resource allocation and service provisioning and management at the edge and provides a novel model to allocate resources at the edge to maximize utility.
